name: Chalkydri Angel
resistance: radiant; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

traits.name: Angelic Weapons
traits.desc: The chalkydri’s weapon attacks are magical. When the chalkydri hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 4d8 radiant damage (included in the attack).

traits.name: Divine Awareness
traits.desc: The chalkydri knows if it hears a lie.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The chalkydri’s spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: * At will: detect evil and good * 3/day: dispel evil and good, flame strike * 1/day: commune, raise dead

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The chalkydri has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magic effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The chalkydri attacks twice with its glaive.

actions.name: Glaive
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) slashing damage plus 18 (4d8) radiant damage.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, range 30/120 ft., target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) piercing damage plus 18 (4d8) radiant damage.
